data.actual_result: Both the star and the GIF icon are shown
data.expected_result: The star is hidden since the GIF isn't playing
data.short_description: Both the GIF icon and star are shown after clicking a GIF and closing it
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have GIF autoplay disabled - Post a GIF or find an existing one - Click the GIF to open the preview - Hover over the GIF in the chat, and then click to close the preview - Observe
